snippet: BLAIKIE--Donald. His smile will never be forgotten. We send our condolences to Sandy, his children, Jennifer, Nick, Peter, Dana and the Blaikie family. Larry and Adrienne Reinlieb...
lead_paragraph:
BLAIKIE--Donald. His smile will never be forgotten. We send our condolences to Sandy, his children, Jennifer, Nick, Peter, Dana and the Blaikie family.

Larry and Adrienne Reinlieb
